title: Discern
description: ATTENTION: DISCERN has been REVISED and RE-EDITED. The new edition will be available on Amazon February 21, 2012!Discern begins when Haley Helms, a 20 year-old college student, is compelled to return home to Boulder, Colorado, after her heart is shattered by love's betrayal. After a chance meeting with an alluring passenger on the plane ride home, her life will never be the same.Thrust into a once-believed mythical world, she finds out the stranger on the plane is no ordinary man. Andrew Alexander, an immortal called a Parevite, has spent many centuries, along with the others of his kind, altering much of mankind's beliefs. Andrew is hell-bent on winning Haley's heart, no matter the cost. But will his dark side and catastrophic secret destroy any chance? DISCERN, the first in the series by Samantha Shakespeare.~~~ This book is suggested for ages 17+ ~~~Discord, the second book in the series will be out Early March 2012.
author: Samantha Shakespeare
